title: Can you backup device, photos&vids,from different devices at the same time without overwriting data
content: My Pixel 2 has to be sent for repair, so I need to put my SIM card into my old Samsung phone that has not been used in years.  My Samsung has data that I had not synched /backed up (some photos videos etc) , if I back up the data now in the old phone to the Cloud, will it overwrite my new Pixel 2 data, or will it just merge all of the data into the folders and no t replace anything?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
